<Meta title="Templates/Components/GridView" />

# Default Grid View Factory

```jsx
const dropZoneSettings = {
	limit: -1,
	maxSize: 1024 * 1024 * 20,
	multiple: true
};

const DefaultGridViewFactory = (props) => {

	const {
		Component = GridView,
		QuickSearchComponent = null,
		...otherProps
	} = props;

	const ComposedGridView = R.compose(
		withGridViewConfig, //load grid configuration with default mapping
		withGridViewRecentHistory, //add recent view history feature for the grid
		withGridViewQuickSearch(QuickSearchComponent), //add quick search capabilities
		withGridViewExportActions, //add local data export feature
		withGridViewDomainActions, //load domain grid actions from the Unity configuration
		withGridViewDetailView, //add detail view mode
		withGridViewDropZone(dropZoneSettings), //turn the grid into drop area
	)(Component);

	return (
		<ComposedGridView {...otherProps}/>
	);
};
```
